description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a horizontal list of video items in an Android TV application. It manages focus, selection, and visual presentation for each video card, including handling favorites and progress overlays.

classes.name: VideosRowAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of Video objects as horizontally scrollable video cards with focus and selection handling.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a VideoVH holder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to each ViewHolder, sets up focus and key event listeners, and updates UI based on favorite and progress overlays.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of videos.

methods.name: setFocusedIndex
methods.description: Updates the current focused index and refreshes the list.

inner_classes.name: VideoVH
inner_classes.description: ViewHolder class caching item view references and providing UI update methods for focus state, favorite overlay, and progress bar.

methods.name: applyFocused
methods.description: Updates the visual focus ring and scaling when a video card gains or loses focus.

methods.name: bindFavorite
methods.description: Displays or hides the favorite badge overlay.

methods.name: bindProgressPercent
methods.description: Updates the progress bar fill based on playback progress.
